transcript.text: Well, hello ! You are going to regret clicking on this.
Guys, there is something I never told you :
I HATE some specific noises.
Well, like everybody. Everyone hates some noises like the chalk on the board, ect...
Just like you, I don't like those noises. But there is noises I PARTICULARLY hate.
And those are really LOUD thumps.
The thing that SUDDENLY lands like that, it...

I don't know, I just want to run away and cry.
Like REALLY.
It's so weird !
It doesn't just hurt my ears or anything,
It just... psychologically, I feel something weird !
I don't know why.
Maybe when my mom was pregnant, my father was talking to me with a megaphone,
Tailgated to my mom's belly.
And it traumatized me.
Worse of explainations !
Anyway! I asked you on Twitter to send me videos of UNBEARABLE sounds.
Why, because today, new challenge !
The "Try to not quit this video" challenge !
So you send me absolutly AWFUL sounds.
I don't know why I make us suffer like that. to be honest, I have no idea.
But I feel like it's important.
Oh wait !
"Here you go, Squeezie ! Hope you will enjoy this wonderful moment".
"Top of the most annoying sounds" Well, perfect  exacly what we need !
Here we go !
Boy, I feel like I'm going to regret this...
So much.
*Screeching*
Okay, It's alright; No seriously, it's alright.
Really, this is alright. Personnally, I...
The chalk's doing shitty noises, but the nail is even worse !
Just HEARING the nail, you feel it in YOUR nail !
And that's horrible !
Okay, second one.
Okay, I'm going to confess you something...
Dude, I do this everytime ! I'm the worse !
I DO THIS EVERYTIME !
But wait- I got an excuse ! I got a problem with that.
When I order a drink, and I PAID for it? I will drink it like that,
And if when I leave, there is still one little drop, I'M FEELING BAD !
I'm like "Fuck, there's still two cents in my glass, what's that !"
And I MUST drink those two cents !
And It'll be so smart of me to get the straw off to drink what's left, voila...
But I'm not smart, okay.
That's horrible !
THIS is horrible !
It's... It's not the worst-
Ugh... Yeah, maybe it is.
*calm down chum*
I WANT TO- AHH !
This is such an annoying sound, 'cause... you know, when you usually hear it,
It's morning, breakfast time.
When your brother or sister is here and dosent pay attention and being big asshole
And is being a big ASSHOLE !!
Sorry, excuse-me, I lost my mind.
You know, in the morning, when you put a feet out of your bed...
Personally, when I get out of bed, nobody should talk to me for at least an hour.
I am really grumpy at morning, and if someone talks to me it PISSES ME OFF.
SHUT UP, JOSEPHINE !
And it's usually at this moment that I hear people eating.
If we're noon, I don't give a shit. I'm like :
"Man, this dude's gross !"
But in the morning, I'm like :
"Man, I'm gonna cut his head off !"
Anyway.
Oh right, ASMR stuff
THOSE ARE ATROCIOUS !
I heard one one time...
Wait, is that really what I think this is.
DAMN, I JUST EATED, I'M GONNA PUKE !
So... there's something with ASMR... I don't get it.
I just don't what this is... Is it...
Is it supposed to be relaxing ?
Am I doing my old dude, like :
"Y'know, I'm an old fart ! That's not from my time !"
Stop saying that, adult ! It annoys me !
Does it really relaxes people ??
Dude, it's crazy !
Like, really ! Like, 7 200 people loves it.
They said "Damn"
"Hearing plenty of fucking disgusting mouth noises, I love that, really".
That's awesome !
"What's up my munchlings ?"
AH YEAH, THEY WHISPER !
Sorry, excuse-me, I shouldn't...
I shouldn't make fun of this, because it can do good on people.
I shouldn't make fun of things that can do good on people.
Knowing that it doesn't hurt us either.
I mean, it hurts ME, 'cause I clicked on it, but you don't have to click on it either !
I don't get it... Dude...!
I feel so inconfortable...
Wait, there's another one. She does that with different kinds of food.
So it doesn't soud the same, right ?
I'm discovering ASMR in the middle of the video, it's amazing.
Dude, she's eating that like a savage...!
FELT LIKE IT WAS AT FULL VOLUME, DUDE !
*Squeezie, r u ok*
Maybe I'm gonna get the whole french ASMR community against me
"BUT WAIT U JUDJE BUT U DUNNO WHAT GUD IT DOZ 2 US!!!"
Okay, but you don't know how fucking bad it does to me!
But seriously tho. I don't get what's up with ASMR.
If it does good to you,
Well, good for you,
If it does bad on you,
NEVER EVER CLICK ON THOSE THINGS AGAIN.
This is what I do.
Not ever again, it's over.
Thanks Arnaud for showing me this, that was
ATROCIOUS.
Okay, Cat Bill send us a video.
*coucou*
(laughing)
oh it was endless
no it wasn't unbearable    stop
it's not unbearable it's funny just funny to put the intro of someone again and again  it works whit everybody you put anyone at his place
NEXT ! oh french ASMR wait I wanna see the french ASMR
(whisper) hi everyone so today i'm gonna do an eating food video  yesterday I made quiche
yhea
small molds actually
cool
and I have one for midday well maybe not because it's not midday but...
(laughing)
she has doubts in the middle of the video
ahhh we appreciate what is going on  there's 6 minute's left we are well
